text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Thursday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Bahrain's Emir, King Hussein hold talks. Jordanian king calls for friendly settlement to border disputes in the region. The king paid a 24-hour visit to Bahrain on Tuesday.
- Bahrain's trade rises to 1.5 million dinars in the first half of 1996, with a 40.6 million dinar surplus.
- Emir hails visit by King Hussein of Jordan.
- Bahrain to host key banking conference in October.
